summary: This is an email from CBP's automated system notifying of a 'silent hit' on an Advance Passenger Information (API) query for Jeffrey Epstein, indicating his private flight N212JE was scheduled to arrive at Teterboro Airport (KTEB) on May 5, 2019. The record was an exact match but not displayed due to being a silent hit.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of an Advance Passenger Information (API) query by CBP; his private flight N212JE was scheduled to arrive at Teterboro Airport on May 5, 2019, triggering a 'silent hit'.

events.title: Epstein's flight arrival triggers CBP silent hit
events.description: An Advance Passenger Information (API) query by CBP resulted in an exact match and 'silent hit' for Jeffrey Epstein's arrival on private flight N212JE at Teterboro Airport (KTEB).

keyFacts: A CBP automated system generated a 'silent hit' on an Advance Passenger Information (API) query for Jeffrey Epstein on May 4, 2019.
Epstein was scheduled to arrive at Teterboro Airport (KTEB) on private flight N212JE on May 5, 2019, at 16:02.
The 'silent hit' status meant the matching record was not displayed to the querying user.
